function.name: create_video_motion_360_orbit
function.description: Creates a video with '360 Orbit' effect. The camera smoothly circles all the way around the subject, creating a dynamic, immersive view. Perfect for dramatic reveals, showcasing outfits, or adding visual energy.

metadata.description: The camera smoothly circles all the way around the subject, creating a dynamic, immersive view. Perfect for dramatic reveals, showcasing outfits, or adding visual energy.

function.name: create_video_motion_3d_rotation
function.description: Creates a video with '3D Rotation' effect. The subject or product spins smoothly in place, showing a full 360° view. Clean, centered, and perfect for showcasing design, fashion, or product details in a modern way.

metadata.description: The subject or product spins smoothly in place, showing a full 360° view. Clean, centered, and perfect for showcasing design, fashion, or product details in a modern way.

function.name: create_video_motion_abstract
function.description: Creates a video with 'Abstract' effect. Unusual shapes, shifting colors, and surreal motion that break away from reality. Evokes emotion, mystery, or chaos through non-traditional, artistic visuals.

metadata.description: Unusual shapes, shifting colors, and surreal motion that break away from reality. Evokes emotion, mystery, or chaos through non-traditional, artistic visuals.

function.name: create_video_motion_action_run
function.description: Creates a video with 'Action Run' effect. Follows the subject in fast-paced motion, often with shaky cam and dynamic angles. Perfect for chase scenes, high-energy moments, or intense action shots.

metadata.description: Follows the subject in fast-paced motion, often with shaky cam and dynamic angles. Perfect for chase scenes, high-energy moments, or intense action shots.

function.name: create_video_motion_agent_reveal
function.description: Creates a video with 'Agent Reveal' effect. The subject jerks or shakes their head as their face and body glitch and morph into a sharp-suited agent figure. Fast, surreal, and powerful—perfect for sudden identity shifts or secret transformations.

metadata.description: The subject jerks or shakes their head as their face and body glitch and morph into a sharp-suited agent figure. Fast, surreal, and powerful—perfect for sudden identity shifts or secret transformations.

function.name: create_video_motion_angel_wings
function.description: Creates a video with 'Angel Wings' effect. Wings spreading open behind person shoulders.

metadata.description: Wings spreading open behind person shoulders.

function.name: create_video_motion_arc_left
function.description: Creates a video with 'Arc Left' effect. The camera curves gracefully around the subject to the left, adding a sense of movement, focus, and cinematic style. Ideal for emotional build-up or visual flair.

metadata.description: The camera curves gracefully around the subject to the left, adding a sense of movement, focus, and cinematic style. Ideal for emotional build-up or visual flair.

function.name: create_video_motion_arc_right
function.description: Creates a video with 'Arc Right' effect. The camera circles gently to the right around the subject, creating dynamic depth and flow. Perfect for adding elegance or cinematic intensity to a scene.

metadata.description: The camera circles gently to the right around the subject, creating dynamic depth and flow. Perfect for adding elegance or cinematic intensity to a scene.

function.name: create_video_motion_baseball_kick
function.description: Creates a video with 'Baseball Kick' effect. Captures the moment of a powerful baseball-style kick, with fast leg motion and dramatic impact. Perfect for action or stylized sports edits.

metadata.description: Captures the moment of a powerful baseball-style kick, with fast leg motion and dramatic impact. Perfect for action or stylized sports edits.

function.name: create_video_motion_basketball_dunks
function.description: Creates a video with 'Basketball Dunks' effect. Captures the high-energy motion of a person jumping and slamming a basketball into the hoop. Powerful, athletic, and dramatic—perfect for sports or hype edits.

metadata.description: Captures the high-energy motion of a person jumping and slamming a basketball into the hoop. Powerful, athletic, and dramatic—perfect for sports or hype edits.

function.name: create_video_motion_black_tears
function.description: Creates a video with 'Black Tears' effect. Thick, dark liquid streams from the subject’s eyes, creating a haunting, emotional, or supernatural effect. Perfect for horror, sorrowful moments, or eerie visual storytelling.

metadata.description: Thick, dark liquid streams from the subject’s eyes, creating a haunting, emotional, or supernatural effect. Perfect for horror, sorrowful moments, or eerie visual storytelling.

function.name: create_video_motion_bloom_mouth

function.name: create_video_motion_buckle_up
function.description: Creates a video with 'Buckle Up' effect. Low angle shot from beneath, as if filmed through a transparent glass floor, revealing the person’s figure and soles, creating a dynamic, voyeuristic perspective.

metadata.description: Freezes or slows down the action while the camera moves around the subject. Creates a dramatic, cinematic effect often seen in action or sci-fi scenes.

function.name: create_video_motion_car_chasing

function.name: create_video_motion_catwalk

function.name: create_video_motion_clone_explosion

function.name: create_video_motion_crane_down
function.description: Creates a video with 'Crane Down' effect. Gently lowers the camera from above to the subject, creating a dramatic or revealing entrance. Perfect for introductions, transitions, or emotional emphasis.

function.name: create_video_motion_crane_over_the_head
function.description: Creates a video with 'Crane Over The Head' effect. The camera rises smoothly above the subject using a crane, revealing the surroundings or adding drama. Perfect for epic moments or scene transitions.

metadata.description: The camera rises smoothly above the subject using a crane, revealing the surroundings or adding drama. Perfect for epic moments or scene transitions.

function.name: create_video_motion_crane_up
function.description: Creates a video with 'Crane Up' effect. Lifts the camera smoothly upward using a crane, revealing the scene below or creating an epic rising shot. Great for transitions, reveals, or emotional build-up.

function.name: create_video_motion_crash_zoom_in

function.name: create_video_motion_crash_zoom_out

function.name: create_video_motion_datamosh
function.description: Creates a video with 'Datamosh' effect. A glitchy visual effect where pixels bleed, smear, and blend between frames, creating distorted transitions. Chaotic, trippy, and perfect for edgy, experimental, or digital glitch aesthetics.

metadata.description: A glitchy visual effect where pixels bleed, smear, and blend between frames, creating distorted transitions. Chaotic, trippy, and perfect for edgy, experimental, or digital glitch aesthetics.

function.name: create_video_motion_diamond

function.name: create_video_motion_dirty_lens

metadata.description: A visual effect where the subject breaks apart into particles or dust, creating a surreal, emotional, or epic moment

function.name: create_video_motion_dolly_in
function.description: Creates a video with 'Dolly In' effect. Moves the camera smoothly toward the subject, drawing viewers closer and building focus or emotion. Ideal for intense or intimate moments.

metadata.description: Moves the camera smoothly toward the subject, drawing viewers closer and building focus or emotion. Ideal for intense or intimate moments.

function.name: create_video_motion_dolly_left
function.description: Creates a video with 'Dolly Left' effect. Moves the camera smoothly to the left, following or revealing the scene. Perfect for tracking shots, transitions, or adding visual interest.

metadata.description: Moves the camera smoothly to the left, following or revealing the scene. Perfect for tracking shots, transitions, or adding visual interest.

function.name: create_video_motion_dolly_out
function.description: Creates a video with 'Dolly Out' effect. Pulls the camera smoothly away from the subject, revealing more of the scene. Great for emotional distance, dramatic exits, or cinematic reveals.

metadata.description: Pulls the camera smoothly away from the subject, revealing more of the scene. Great for emotional distance, dramatic exits, or cinematic reveals.

function.name: create_video_motion_dolly_right
function.description: Creates a video with 'Dolly Right' effect. Moves the camera smoothly to the right alongside the subject or scene. Great for tracking motion, revealing space, or adding cinematic flow.

metadata.description: Moves the camera smoothly to the right alongside the subject or scene. Great for tracking motion, revealing space, or adding cinematic flow.

function.name: create_video_motion_dolly_zoom_in
function.description: Creates a video with 'Dolly Zoom In' effect. Moves the camera forward while zooming out, warping perspective and creating a dramatic, unsettling effect. Great for shock, realization, or tension.

metadata.description: Moves the camera forward while zooming out, warping perspective and creating a dramatic, unsettling effect. Great for shock, realization, or tension.

function.name: create_video_motion_dolly_zoom_out
function.description: Creates a video with 'Dolly Zoom Out' effect. Moves the camera backward while zooming in, distorting perspective to heighten emotion or suspense. Perfect for dramatic reveals or intense moments.

metadata.description: Moves the camera backward while zooming in, distorting perspective to heighten emotion or suspense. Perfect for dramatic reveals or intense moments.

function.name: create_video_motion_double_dolly
function.description: Creates a video with 'Double Dolly' effect. Both the camera and subject move together on dollies, keeping the subject perfectly still in frame while the background shifts. Creates a surreal, floating effect often used in music videos and dreamlike scenes.

metadata.description: Both the camera and subject move together on dollies, keeping the subject perfectly still in frame while the background shifts. Creates a surreal, floating effect often used in music videos and dreamlike scenes.

function.name: create_video_motion_downhill_pov

function.name: create_video_motion_duplicate

function.name: create_video_motion_dutch_angle

function.name: create_video_motion_sand_storm
function.description: Creates a video with 'Sand Storm' effect. A powerful blast of sand sweeps through the scene, partially or fully engulfing the subject. Dust swirls, visibility drops—ideal for desert chaos, dramatic reveals, or elemental visuals.

metadata.description: A powerful blast of sand sweeps through the scene, partially or fully engulfing the subject. Dust swirls, visibility drops—ideal for desert chaos, dramatic reveals, or elemental visuals.

function.name: create_video_motion_set_on_fire
function.description: Creates a video with 'Set on Fire' effect. The subject bursts into flames in an instant, engulfed by intense fire. Dramatic and powerful—perfect for action scenes, supernatural moments, or explosive visuals.

metadata.description: The subject bursts into flames in an instant, engulfed by intense fire. Dramatic and powerful—perfect for action scenes, supernatural moments, or explosive visuals.

function.name: create_video_motion_skateboard_glide
function.description: Creates a video with 'Skateboard Glide' effect. Smooth, flowing motion as the board rolls effortlessly. Relaxed and stylish, perfect for cruising scenes or aesthetic edits.

metadata.description: Smooth, flowing motion as the board rolls effortlessly. Relaxed and stylish, perfect for cruising scenes or aesthetic edits.

function.name: create_video_motion_skateboard_ollie
function.description: Creates a video with 'Skateboard Ollie' effect. The classic jump where the rider and board lift off the ground without using hands. Clean, stylish, and the foundation of almost every trick.

metadata.description: The classic jump where the rider and board lift off the ground without using hands. Clean, stylish, and the foundation of almost every trick.

function.name: create_video_motion_skate_cruise
function.description: Creates a video with 'Skate Cruise' effect. Smooth, relaxed riding without tricks—just pushing and gliding through the streets. Feels calm, effortless, and stylish. Perfect for chill, aesthetic edits or street vibes.

metadata.description: Smooth, relaxed riding without tricks—just pushing and gliding through the streets. Feels calm, effortless, and stylish. Perfect for chill, aesthetic edits or street vibes.

function.name: create_video_motion_ski_carving
function.description: Creates a video with 'Ski Carving' effect. Shows a skier making clean, fast turns on the slope. Dynamic, smooth, and elegant—ideal for scenic mountain action.

metadata.description: Shows a skier making clean, fast turns on the slope. Dynamic, smooth, and elegant—ideal for scenic mountain action.

function.name: create_video_motion_skin_surge
function.description: Creates a video with 'Skin Surge' effect. Objects like hands, flowers, or surreal forms emerge smoothly from the subject’s skin, as if breaking through a living surface. Organic, eerie, or poetic—perfect for fantasy, horror, or dreamlike visuals.

metadata.description: Objects like hands, flowers, or surreal forms emerge smoothly from the subject’s skin, as if breaking through a living surface. Organic, eerie, or poetic—perfect for fantasy, horror, or dreamlike visuals.

function.name: create_video_motion_ski_powder
function.description: Creates a video with 'Ski Powder' effect. Captures a skier cutting through deep snow with soft, explosive bursts. Dreamy and powerful, with a sense of freedom.

metadata.description: Captures a skier cutting through deep snow with soft, explosive bursts. Dreamy and powerful, with a sense of freedom.

function.name: create_video_motion_snorricam
function.description: Creates a video with 'Snorricam' effect. The movement captures the rhythm of the actor’s steps, creating a disorienting, visceral effect that emphasizes tension or distress’

metadata.description: The movement captures the rhythm of the actor’s steps, creating a disorienting, visceral effect that emphasizes tension or distress’

function.name: create_video_motion_snowboard_carving
function.description: Creates a video with 'Snowboard Carving' effect. Highlights deep, controlled turns on a snowboard, with snow spraying out as the board slices the slope. Stylish and precise.

metadata.description: Highlights deep, controlled turns on a snowboard, with snow spraying out as the board slices the slope. Stylish and precise.

function.name: create_video_motion_snowboard_powder
function.description: Creates a video with 'Snowboard Powder' effect. Follows a snowboarder floating through fresh powder with wide turns and big sprays. Feels smooth, wild, and free.

metadata.description: Follows a snowboarder floating through fresh powder with wide turns and big sprays. Feels smooth, wild, and free.

function.name: create_video_motion_soul_jump
function.description: Creates a video with 'Soul Jump' effect. The subject’s soul visibly leaves the body—floating or leaping outward in a surreal, dreamlike motion. Perfect for magical, spiritual, or out-of-body visuals.

metadata.description: The subject’s soul visibly leaves the body—floating or leaping outward in a surreal, dreamlike motion. Perfect for magical, spiritual, or out-of-body visuals.

function.name: create_video_motion_static
function.description: Creates a video with 'Static' effect. The camera remains completely still, with no motion or shake. Clean, neutral, and steady—ideal for dialogue scenes or minimalist aesthetics.

metadata.description: The camera remains completely still, with no motion or shake. Clean, neutral, and steady—ideal for dialogue scenes or minimalist aesthetics.

function.name: create_video_motion_super_8mm
function.description: Creates a video with 'Super 8MM' effect. Grainy texture, soft flicker, and warm faded tones with light leaks and frame jitter. Evokes a nostalgic, dreamy mood like old home movies from the 60s–70s.

metadata.description: Grainy texture, soft flicker, and warm faded tones with light leaks and frame jitter. Evokes a nostalgic, dreamy mood like old home movies from the 60s–70s.

function.name: create_video_motion_super_dolly_in
function.description: Creates a video with 'Super Dolly In' effect. Smoothly moves the camera straight toward the subject for a focused, cinematic effect. Great for building tension, emotion, or spotlighting key moments.

metadata.description: Smoothly moves the camera straight toward the subject for a focused, cinematic effect. Great for building tension, emotion, or spotlighting key moments.

function.name: create_video_motion_super_dolly_out
function.description: Creates a video with 'Super Dolly Out' effect. Smoothly pulls the camera away from the subject, revealing more of the scene. Perfect for dramatic exits, emotional distance, or scene transitions.

metadata.description: Smoothly pulls the camera away from the subject, revealing more of the scene. Perfect for dramatic exits, emotional distance, or scene transitions.

function.name: create_video_motion_tentacles
function.description: Creates a video with 'Tentacles' effect. A surreal VFX effect where tentacles emerge from a person’s eyes, twisting and moving as if alive. Adds a creepy, otherworldly vibe perfect for horror or sci-fi scenes.

metadata.description: A surreal VFX effect where tentacles emerge from a person’s eyes, twisting and moving as if alive. Adds a creepy, otherworldly vibe perfect for horror or sci-fi scenes.

function.name: create_video_motion_through_object_in
function.description: Creates a video with 'Through Object In' effect. Moves the camera inward through an object to focus on the subject behind it. Perfect for creative reveals and smooth, immersive transitions.

metadata.description: Moves the camera inward through an object to focus on the subject behind it. Perfect for creative reveals and smooth, immersive transitions.

function.name: create_video_motion_through_object_out
function.description: Creates a video with 'Through Object Out' effect. Moves the camera outward through an object, revealing the scene behind it. Creates a smooth, creative transition and adds depth to your storytelling.

metadata.description: Moves the camera outward through an object, revealing the scene behind it. Creates a smooth, creative transition and adds depth to your storytelling.

function.name: create_video_motion_thunder_god
function.description: Creates a video with 'Thunder God' effect. Eyes glow with intense, electric energy while lightning flickers around the subject. Evokes divine power, rage, or transformation—perfect for epic, supernatural moments.

metadata.description: Eyes glow with intense, electric energy while lightning flickers around the subject. Evokes divine power, rage, or transformation—perfect for epic, supernatural moments.

function.name: create_video_motion_tilt_down
function.description: Creates a video with 'Tilt Down' effect. Rotates the camera angle downward, revealing what’s below or shifting focus. Great for dramatic reveals, transitions, or guiding the viewer’s eye.

metadata.description: Rotates the camera angle downward, revealing what’s below or shifting focus. Great for dramatic reveals, transitions, or guiding the viewer’s eye.

function.name: create_video_motion_tilt_up
function.description: Creates a video with 'Tilt up' effect. Moves the camera upward to reveal something or make the subject feel powerful, grand, or important

metadata.description: Moves the camera upward to reveal something or make the subject feel powerful, grand, or important

function.name: create_video_motion_timelapse_human
function.description: Creates a video with 'Timelapse Human' effect. Speeds up human motion while the environment stays natural, showing quick movements like walking, dressing, or dancing. Adds energy, urgency, or a surreal, fast-forwarded feel.

metadata.description: Speeds up human motion while the environment stays natural, showing quick movements like walking, dressing, or dancing. Adds energy, urgency, or a surreal, fast-forwarded feel.

function.name: create_video_motion_timelapse_landscape
function.description: Creates a video with 'Timelapse Landscape' effect. Captures the rapid movement of natural elements like clouds, sunlight, or crowds over time. Creates a majestic, dreamlike view of changing landscapes and passing moments.

metadata.description: Captures the rapid movement of natural elements like clouds, sunlight, or crowds over time. Creates a majestic, dreamlike view of changing landscapes and passing moments.

function.name: create_video_motion_turning_metal
function.description: Creates a video with 'Turning Metal' effect. The subject’s skin and body slowly transform into reflective, metallic surfaces—like silver, gold, or chrome. Feels powerful, surreal, and perfect for sci-fi or high-fashion edits.

metadata.description: The subject’s skin and body slowly transform into reflective, metallic surfaces—like silver, gold, or chrome. Feels powerful, surreal, and perfect for sci-fi or high-fashion edits.

function.name: create_video_motion_vhs
function.description: Creates a video with 'VHS' effect. Faded colors, static noise, scan lines, and tracking glitches with a soft blur. Feels like a worn-out 80s–90s videotape, raw and nostalgic.

metadata.description: Faded colors, static noise, scan lines, and tracking glitches with a soft blur. Feels like a worn-out 80s–90s videotape, raw and nostalgic.

function.name: create_video_motion_whip_pan
function.description: Creates a video with 'Whip Pan' effect. A fast camera pan that blurs the scene, used to transition between shots or add energy and speed. Great for action, comedy, or sudden scene changes.

metadata.description: A fast camera pan that blurs the scene, used to transition between shots or add energy and speed. Great for action, comedy, or sudden scene changes.

function.name: create_video_motion_wiggle
function.description: Creates a video with 'Wiggle' effect. Combines slight shaky “wiggle” motion with a smooth zoom or pan to reveal the subject. Adds playful energy and keeps the shot dynamic and engaging, perfect for stylish intros or creative reveals.

metadata.description: Combines slight shaky “wiggle” motion with a smooth zoom or pan to reveal the subject. Adds playful energy and keeps the shot dynamic and engaging, perfect for stylish intros or creative reveals.

function.name: create_video_motion_wind_to_face
function.description: Creates a video with 'Wind to Face' effect. Intense wind blasts the subject with extreme force—hair whips, clothes thrash, and the body leans into the pressure. Creates a dramatic, chaotic, or high-impact visual moment.

metadata.description: Intense wind blasts the subject with extreme force—hair whips, clothes thrash, and the body leans into the pressure. Creates a dramatic, chaotic, or high-impact visual moment.

function.name: create_video_motion_yoyo_zoom
function.description: Creates a video with 'YoYo Zoom' effect. A rapid in-and-out zoom motion that mimics the snap of a yoyo—fast, playful, and punchy. Adds energy, tension, or comic effect to your scene.

metadata.description: A rapid in-and-out zoom motion that mimics the snap of a yoyo—fast, playful, and punchy. Adds energy, tension, or comic effect to your scene.

function.name: create_video_motion_zoom_in
function.description: Creates a video with 'Zoom In' effect. Gradually moves closer to the subject, building focus, tension, or emotional intensity

metadata.description: Gradually moves closer to the subject, building focus, tension, or emotional intensity

function.name: create_video_motion_zoom_out
function.description: Creates a video with 'Zoom Out' effect. Gradually pulls back to reveal more of the scene, creating distance, suspense, or a sense of isolation

metadata.description: Gradually pulls back to reveal more of the scene, creating distance, suspense, or a sense of isolation
